name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Unique identifier for this particular Contract Provision.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Unique identifier for this particular Contract Provision.

name: $issued
desc: Returns: When this Contract Provision was issued.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: When this Contract Provision was issued.

name: $applies
desc: Returns: Relevant time or time-period when this Contract Provision is applicable.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Relevant time or time-period when this Contract Provision is applicable.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: Type of Contract Provision such as specific requirements, purposes for actions, obligations, prohibitions, e.g. life time maximum benefit.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Type of Contract Provision such as specific requirements, purposes for actions, obligations, prohibitions, e.g. life time maximum benefit.

name: $subType
desc: Returns: Subtype of this Contract Provision, e.g. life time maximum payment for a contract term for specific valued item, e.g. disability payment.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Subtype of this Contract Provision, e.g. life time maximum payment for a contract term for specific valued item, e.g. disability payment.

name: $topic
desc: Returns: The matter of concern in the context of this provision of the agrement.

name: $addtopic
desc: The matter of concern in the context of this provision of the agrement.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The matter of concern in the context of this provision of the agrement.

name: $action
desc: Returns: Action stipulated by this Contract Provision.

name: $addaction
desc: Action stipulated by this Contract Provision.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Action stipulated by this Contract Provision.

name: $actionReason
desc: Returns: Reason or purpose for the action stipulated by this Contract Provision.

name: $addactionReason
desc: Reason or purpose for the action stipulated by this Contract Provision.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Reason or purpose for the action stipulated by this Contract Provision.

name: $securityLabel
desc: Returns: A set of security labels that define which terms are controlled by this condition.

name: $addsecurityLabel
desc: A set of security labels that define which terms are controlled by this condition.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A set of security labels that define which terms are controlled by this condition.

name: $agent
desc: Returns: An actor taking a role in an activity for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.

name: $addagent
desc: An actor taking a role in an activity for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An actor taking a role in an activity for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.

name: $text
desc: Returns: Human readable form of this Contract Provision.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Human readable form of this Contract Provision.

name: $valuedItem
desc: Returns: Contract Provision Valued Item List.
